page.title: 06Folklore
page.content: There was once a giant on St.Agnes Beacon called Bolster who could step from the Beacon to Carn Brea.There was also a giant on Carn Brea.There was a feud between the giant on Carn Brea and Giant Bolster.They hurled rocks at each other. It is said that Bolster was stronger than the Giant on Carn Brea and threw all of his rocks onto Carn Brea.Eventually Bolster died and even today parts of his body and possessions can be seen protruding through the surface of the Carn. It is said that the Giant on the Carn gathered some rocks together and formed clusters all over the Carn.
